attributes.action: halt glasgow city council from imposing anti family friendly poilicies on its workforce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GLASGOW CITY COUNCIL WITH ELECTED MEMBERS CONSENT ARE TRYING TO FORCE THROUGH A CHANGE OF SHIFT  PATTERN/CONDITIONS TO THE WORKFORCE. CHANGES ARE A 4 ON 4 OFF SHIFT PATTERN WORKING 10 1/2 HOURS A SHIFT & STANDBY DUTY AFTER YOUR SHIFT UNLESS YOU LOSE BETWEEN £800-£1,300 ALSO DUE TO 4 ON 4 OFF YOU ARE WORKING PART OF THE WEEKEND FOR 5 OUT OF EIGHT ,REDUCING THE ANNUAL HOLIDAYS BY 8 DAYS & REDUCING THE PUBLIC HOLIDAYS BY 3 .THE START TIME WOULD BE 7AM OR HALF 7AM LEAVING PARENTS WITH NO CHILD CARE AS PRE SCHOOL AND NURSARIES RUN BY THE SAME ADMIN DO NOT OPEN TILL 8AM . TRANSPORT ISSUES ALSO ARE AN ISSUE AS SUNDAY SERVICES ARE A REDUCED SERVICE ,RELIGOUS ISSUES HAVE BEEN BRUSHED ASSIDE ,YOUNG WORKING FAMILIES ARE FACED WITH GIVING UP A 2ND INCOME TO MAKE ENDS MEET AS THERE WOULD BE NO CHILD CARE AS THE MAIN EARNER WOULD BE FORCED TO WORK LATE AND AT WEEKENDS . ALSO ANYONE WHO KEEPS THEIR WEEKEND FOR FAMILY TIME OR EVEN A PASS TIME ISNT CONSIDERED TO HAVE AN ISSUE THIS IS A SMALL BUT NOT COMPLETE LIST OF THE PROBLEMS FACED . UNFORTUNATELY THE MANAGEMENT GIVE FALSE INFORMATION TO THE COUNCILLORS & MANY ARE FOLLOWING THE PARTY LEADER COUNCILOR PURCELL WHO IS DAMAGING SUPPORT IN A ONCE SAFE STRONGHOLD

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
